query:
SELECT
                ZCREATIONDATE AS 'creation_date!: AppleCoreDateTime',
                ZSUBTITLE AS subtitle,
                ZTEXT AS text,
                ZTITLE AS title,
                ZUNIQUEIDENTIFIER AS 'id!'
             FROM
                ZSFNOTE 
             WHERE
                ZARCHIVED = 0 AND (ZTEXT LIKE ? OR ZTITLE LIKE ?)
